name: Jason LD Organization
author: Fabrizio Pivari

sections.description:
Jason LD Organization is a WordPress plugin that helps you to set parameters of Organization schema using JSON-LD schema.org/Organization . These are the fields you can set (if you need others, contact us) Name (organization name) is the only required field Telephone (organization telephone number) Fax Number (organization fax number) email (organization email) With the Donation version you can also set the fields for Logo and Social Profiles in Knowledge Graph

Test the final jason configuration at https://developers.google.com/structured-data/testing-tool/
sections.installation:
1. Upload jason-ld-org directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add the Organization information to the Jason LD Organization
sections.faq:
I need other Organizzation schema fields

Contact directly us at info (at) pivari.com, we will add them in next releases
